doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 21 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 197 [Air Date: 5/21/1986]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 21 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 197 [Air Date: 5/21/1986]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Washington State, initiative proposed to make employing gays for jobs caring for children, the disabled, or senior citizens a gross misdemeanor; uses very discriminatory language to describe gays2. Knoxville, Tennessee, church votes to allow Metropolitan Community Church to continue using its facility3. Interview with co-coordinators of Heritage of Pride, Inc., discuss the forthcoming NYC Gay Pride March and RallyCOMMERCIAL: "New York Native" with Quentin Crisp4. Notre Dame prohibits gay/lesbian group from using radio station5. Andy Humm on Catholic church's prohibitive stance on priests and sexuality6. California extends equal employment protection to gays and lesbiansCOMMERCIAL: Urban General Warehouse sale7. Wisconsin AIDS task force moves for contact testing8. Travel tips for people with AIDS9. California governor approves selective testing for HTLVIII antibody in "high-risk" patients10. Proposed AIDS insurance bill revised to prohibit testing by insurance companiesCOMMERCIAL: NGTF Fund for Human Dignity11. Sports Report12. Outreach: Conversations with GMHC: Interview with Casey Donovan, sex-act performer, discussing safer sex and the proper use of condoms13. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. This Week in Gay History with Jeff BixbyCOMMERCIAL: E-Z Trim exercise equipment2. Clips of Lyndon LaRouche discussing AIDS and Mark Fairchild discussing AIDS patients3. Media Watch: interview with "Mandate" magazine editor, Freeman GuntherCOMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation featuring Jose Sarria4. Interview with Phil Zwickler about "Rights and Reactions," a documentary film chronicling NYC's fight to pass the gay rights bill, with clipsCOMMERCIAL: The MonsterCOMMERCIAL: SF AIDS Foundation, tape ends
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 21 [2]--The Right Stuff, Episode No. 197 [Air Date: 5/21/1986]: May 1986
